name: Spiki Game Box
description: The Spiki Game Box is a collection of 4 combined role play games. Each one of them will lead you through its own story, full of horror, drama, and comedy. Upon launch you can select from the following games:Alex and the basement of Fun - A NovelFeel yourself in the shoes of a young girl who was kidnapped by a guy who fell in love with her and imprisoned her in his mansion. Make an important choice on which your future life depends. And do not forget to listen to your heart, because everything is not always what you think!!Party NightYou're at a party...a party with a bad ending. Actually, this is a game guide about the dangers of being alone in unknown places, but see for yourself!Dungeon Abyss: An Adventurer's ResortBe immersed in the life of our protagonist, who has been chosen to fight some unknown dark forces raising from the depths of the earth! Their great desire is to conquer the Holy Land, the place where our heroine lives, together with the people of the local town. Go and discover what's happening with this great force, and find your own path for being powerful and destroy them. You will meet wonderful, unique, characteristic friends that will accompany you in this adventure. Explore the depths of the dungeons, and find the source of such enormous, malevolent power, and get rid of it so your people will live in peace.Magma DramaCome and enjoy the comedy, drama, and action of Magma Drama, an RPG game!! Meet a man accompanied by his friend Maggie, to investigate the mystery and secrets of the island where they and their people live! All is fun and games until the hero discovers a secret about a hidden volcano that is about to erupt, and only the hero and his friends can save the island and all the inhabitants!! Fight the monsters that used to live inside the volcano, and get the best gear to make them cry! Only you can stop this!!!
